mention.text: a place where people make mistakes
Virginia Gov. Terry McAuliffe on Friday
an executive order that effectively restores the civil rights , including the right to vote , of 206,000 felons , who have been banned from voting in the state since the Civil War
the state since the Civil War
a day in Virginia for celebration
people whose voting rights were previously restored
Attorney General Mark Herring and scholar A.E. Dick Howard
Those who now have the right to vote
